text: قل عسى ان يكون ردف لكم بعض الذى تستعجلون

translations.translation: Say: 'It may well be that some of what you are anxious to hasten is right on your heels.'
Say: "Perhaps some of what you wish to hasten is right behind you."
Say: "The chastisement whose hastening you have been asking for, maybe a part of it has drawn quite near to you."
Say, "Perhaps some of the things which you wish to experience immediately are very close to you."
Say, “It could be that a part of what you are impatient for is (already) after you.”
Say: "Perhaps that which you wish to hasten on, may be close behind you."
Say: Maybe there may have drawn near to you somewhat of that which you seek to hasten on.
Say: 'It may be that riding behind you already is some part of that you seek to hasten on.
Say: It may be that a part of that which ye would hasten on is close behind you.
Say, "It may be that a part of what you would hasten on is close behind you."
Say thou: belike close behind you may be some of that which ye would hasten on.
Say, ‘Perhaps there is right behind you some of what you seek to hasten.’
Say: "It may be that some of the events which ye wish to hasten on may be (close) in your pursuit!"
Say: "Perhaps that which you wish to hasten on, may be close behind you.
Say: 'It may be that part of what you seek to hasten on is already riding behind you'
Say, “Perhaps some of what you are impatient for has drawn near.”
Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient.
[27:72] Say: ‘It may be that part of what you seek to hasten on is close behind you’ — so they were slain at Badr and the remaining chastisement will come to them after death.

(Say) to them, Muhammad: (It may be) and "may be" when it comes from Allah denotes necessity (that a part of that which ye would hasten on) of punishment at the Day of Badr (is close behind you) is coming soon.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم } معناه جَاءَ بَعدَكُم
 وقال: رَدِفَ وأَردفَ بمعنى واحد

translations.translation:
And His saying, "Perhaps your Lord will {radifa} you" - this means that He will come after you.
 He said: "I will return and I will return" with the same meaning.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قُلْ } لهم يا أكمل الرسل بعدما اقترحوا عليك وألحوا: { عَسَىٰ } أي: دنا وقرب { أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم } أي: تبعكم ولحقكم، واللام للتوكيد { بَعْضُ } العذاب { ٱلَّذِي تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ } [النمل: 72] نزوله وحلوله فلحقهم، وهو عذاب يوم بدر
